sentences.en: 96 per cent of the electorate voted against Europeanization in any shape or form.
sentences.cn: 96%的选民投票反对任何形式的欧洲一体化。

sentences.en: check that the pipe end and compression nut are not bent out of shape.
sentences.cn: 检查确认管子末端和压缩螺帽并未弯曲变形。

sentences.en: Either shape up or ship out.
sentences.cn: 如果不好好干就请你走人

sentences.en: Few people doubt his ability to whip the economy into shape.
sentences.cn: 几乎无人怀疑他整顿经济的能力。

sentences.en: He was still in better shape than many young men.
sentences.cn: 他仍然比很多年轻人都要健康。

sentences.en: His battered old hat had completely lost its shape.
sentences.cn: 他那顶破旧的帽子已经完全变形了。

sentences.en: I don't condone violence in any shape or form.
sentences.cn: 我不能容忍任何形式的暴力。

sentences.en: if you're thinking of getting into shape, take it easy and build up slowly.
sentences.cn: 如果你想让身体健康，那就放松一点，慢慢锻炼。

sentences.en: Like it or not, our families shape our lives and make us what we are.
sentences.cn: 不管喜欢与否，我们的家庭塑造我们的生活并铸就我们的个性。

sentences.en: Political influence is being used to shape public opinion and isolate critics.
sentences.cn: 政治影响正被用来左右公众舆论，使批评家们陷于孤立。

sentences.en: retribution arrived in the shape of my irate father.
sentences.cn: 父亲勃然大怒，这就是我受到的惩罚。

sentences.en: She even had plastic surgery to change the shape of her nose.
sentences.cn: 为改变鼻子的形状，她甚至接受了整形手术。

sentences.en: Taper the shape of your eyebrows towards the outer corners.
sentences.cn: 把你的眉毛修剪成越往外眼角越细的月牙形。

sentences.en: the bank was eager to whip the company into shape for eventual sale.
sentences.cn: 这家银行急着要大力整顿好这家公司，以便最终出售。

sentences.en: The buds are conical or pyramidal in shape.
sentences.cn: 花蕾呈圆锥形或金字塔形。

sentences.en: The children cut out shapes (= squares, triangles etc ) from the piece of cardboard.
sentences.cn: 孩子们把卡纸片剪成各种形状。

sentences.en: The economy was not in such bad shape, he says.
sentences.cn: 他说经济状况并不是特别糟糕。

sentences.en: The former hostage is in remarkably good shape considering his ordeal.
sentences.cn: 想想人质曾遭受的折磨，获救后其身体状况已经是出奇地好了。

sentences.en: The glass bottle is the shape of a woman's torso.
sentences.cn: 玻璃杯呈女子身体的形状。

sentences.en: the past few months have seen the state's health insurance legislation begin to take shape.
sentences.cn: 国家医疗保险立法在过去几个月中开始成形。

sentences.en: The plants grow in every shape and size .
sentences.cn: 这些植物有各种形状，各种大小。

sentences.en: The shirt's cuffs won't sag and lose their shape after washing.
sentences.cn: 这件衬衫的袖口洗后照样挺括，不变形。

sentences.en: The trees were in bad shape from dry rot.
sentences.cn: 树木得了干腐病，状况堪忧。

sentences.en: These bras should be handwashed to help them keep their shape.
sentences.cn: 这些胸罩要手洗以保持不变形。

sentences.en: Ultimately, we can change the shape of people's lives.
sentences.cn: 最终，我们可以改变人们的生活状况。

sentences.en: Viewed from above, the valleys form the shape of a man.
sentences.cn: 从上往下俯瞰，山谷呈现出人形轮廓。

sentences.en: What shape is the table?
sentences.cn: 那张桌子是什么形状的？

sentences.en: You can recognize a tree by the shape of its leaves.
sentences.cn: 可以根据树叶的形状辨认出是什么树。

words.tran_cn: 合适的；成某种形状的；有计划的
不成形的；不定形的；不象样的
定形的；形状美观的；样子好的；有条理的
[电子] 整形器，脉冲整形器；[机] 牛头刨床；造型者；塑造者
发展；成形（shape的过去分词和过去式）

phrases.phrase: get into shape (或get someone into shape)

phrases.tran_cn: 以任何形式；在各种情况之下（用于强调）
精神或身体状态好；处于很好的状态；良好的体形；体力好
在外形上；处于良好状态

phrases.phrase: lick (或 knock 或 whip) someone/thing into shape
phrases.tran_cn: （用强力）把…训练好；把…整顿好；使像样
(非正式，主北美)表现好一点，否则滚蛋

phrases.phrase: the shape of things to come

trans.tran_cn: 形状，图形，模糊的影子，状况，特点
trans.tran_en: the form that something has, for example round, square,  triangular  etc

trans.tran_cn: 塑造，决定…的形成，准备（做某动作）
trans.tran_en: to influence something such as a belief, opinion etc and make it develop in a particular way

trans.tran_cn: 使成形； 制造， 塑造
trans.tran_en: Someone or something that shapes a situation or an activity has a very great influence on the way it develops
